devdoc.author: Mihirsinh Parmar <mihirsinh@chainlabs.in>
devdoc.details: Controller owns the NFT contract from where it mints NFTs

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._isDiscountEnabled: is discount enabled on this sale
params._keyCardPerAvatar: number of Key Card to be given per avatar minted
params._phase: which phase does this sale category belongs to
params._price: price per NFT of the sale
params._supply: supply of NFTs allowed to be sold in this sale category

editKeyCardRatioOfSaleCategory(uint256,u.details: edit key card ratio of sale category

editMerkleRootOfSaleCategory(uint256,byt.details: edit new merkle root of sale category

params._newMerkleRoot: new merkle root of sale category id

editPerLimitOfSaleCategory(uint256,uint6.details: edit limits for wallet or transaction

editPriceOfSaleCategory(uint256,uint256).details: edit new price of sale category

params._newPrice: new price for this sale category

editSaleTimeOfSaleCategory(uint256,uint9.details: edit new sale time of sale category

params._newEndTime: new end time of sale category
params._newStartTime: new start time of sale category

editSupplyOfSaleCategory(uint256,uint64).details: edit new supply of sale category

returns._0: discountSigner the address of signer who signs discount codes

getKeyCard().details: getter for key card NFT instance

getSaleCategoryCounter().details: get number of sale categories that have been added

returns.counter: number of sale category that have been added

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

payee(uint256).details: Getter for the address of the payee number `index`.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

releasable(address).details: Getter for the amount of payee's releasable Ether.

releasable(address,address).details: Getter for the amount of payee's releasable `token` tokens. `token` should be the address of an IERC20 contract.

release(address).details: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

release(address,address).details: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of `token` tokens they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals. `token` must be the address of an IERC20 contract.

released(address).details: Getter for the amount of Ether already released to a payee.

released(address,address).details: Getter for the amount of `token` tokens already released to a payee. `token` should be the address of an IERC20 contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

shares(address).details: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

toggleDiscountOfSaleCategory(uint256,boo.details: toggle discount for a sale category

totalReleased().details: Getter for the total amount of Ether already released.

totalReleased(address).details: Getter for the total amount of `token` already released. `token` should be the address of an IERC20 contract.

totalShares().details: Getter for the total shares held by payees.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Controller

AddedSaleCategory(uint256,uint8).notice: logs when new sale category is added

AvatarUpdated(address,address).notice: logs when new avatar is updated

DiscountCodeApplied(uint256).notice: logs when discount code index is applied

DiscountDisabledOnSaleCategory(uint256).notice: logs when discount is disabled for sale category

DiscountEnabledOnSaleCategory(uint256).notice: logs when discount is enabled for sale category

DiscountSignerUpdated(address).notice: logs when discount signer is updated

KeyCardRatioUpdatedForSaleCategory(uint2.notice: logs when key card : avatar NFT ratio is updated for a sale category

MemberKeyCardUpdated(address,address).notice: logs when new member key card is updated

MerkleRootUpdatedSaleCategory(uint256,by.notice: logs when merkle root is updated for sale category

PerLimitUpdatedOfSaleCategory(uint256,ui.notice: logs when limit per wallet and transaction is updated for sale category

PriceUpdatedForSaleCategory(uint256,uint.notice: logs when new price is set for sale category

SupplyUpdatedForSaleCategory(uint256,uin.notice: logs when supply of sale category is updated

TimeUpdatedForSaleCategory(uint256,uint9.notice: logs when start time and end time is updated for a sale category

editKeyCardRatioOfSaleCategory(uint256,u.notice: edit key card ratio of sale category

editMerkleRootOfSaleCategory(uint256,byt.notice: edit new merkle root of sale category

editPriceOfSaleCategory(uint256,uint256).notice: edit new price of sale category

editSaleTimeOfSaleCategory(uint256,uint9.notice: edit new sale time of sale category

editSupplyOfSaleCategory(uint256,uint64).notice: edit new supply of sale category

getKeyCard().notice: get key card NFT contract instance

getSaleCategoryCounter().notice: get number of sale categories that have been added

toggleDiscountOfSaleCategory(uint256,boo.notice: toggle discount for a sale category

userdoc.notice: This contract handles logic of the various NFT sales.
